name: SimpleStock
description: Offline pantry inventory tracker with barcode scanning. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Simple interface for tracking what's in your pantry, fridge, and freezer with expiration reminders.
target_user: Busy households who want to reduce food waste and avoid duplicate purchases
core_loop: Get notifications for items about to expire
differentiation: Focuses solely on inventory tracking without meal planning complexity. Works completely offline with simple barcode database.
subscription_fit: Premium features include unlimited items (free version caps at 50), cloud backup, and household sharing
